守: (shu/mamo/mo) - protect , director (of the provincial governors under the ritsuryo system)
守り: (mori) - babá, cuidar de crianças; proteger, guardar, guardião
守り刀: (まもりがたな) - sword for self-defense; sword for self-defence
守り切る: (まもりきる) - to hold on to something (e.g. secret, lead in a race, etc.)
守り抜く: (まもりぬく) - to hold fast; to protect to the end
守り札: (まもりふだ) - paper charm or talisman
守り立てる: (もりたてる) - to bring up; to support; to rally
守り袋: (まもりぶくろ) - small pouch containing a paper charm or talisman
守る: (mamoru) - to protect, to guard, to defend; to keep (ou seja, uma promessa), to abide (by the rules), to observe, to obey, to follow
守備固め: (しゅびがため) - {baseb} making replacements for defensive purposes in the late inning of a game
守公: (しゅく) - outcasts common around the Kyoto region from the Kamakura period to the Edo period
守刀: (まもりがたな) - sword for self-defense; sword for self-defence
守宮: (しゅく) - outcasts common around the Kyoto region from the Kamakura period to the Edo period
守成: (しゅせい) - building up and maintaining
守戦: (しゅせん) - war of defense; war of defence; defensive fight; defensive warfare
守株: (しゅしゅ) - lack of innovation; stupidity
守破離: (しゅはり) - Shuhari; three stages of learning mastery: the fundamentals, breaking with tradition, parting with traditional wisdom
守秘義務: (しゅひぎむ) - (yoji) duty of confidentiality (concerning private matters learned through one's business)
守秘義務違反: (しゅひぎむいはん) - abuse of confidentiality
守衛所: (しゅえいじょ) - guard station; guard house; guard post
守護: (すご) - protection/safeguard; shugo (Kamakura or Muromachi period military governor)
守護代: (しゅごだい) - acting shugo (Kamakura or Muromachi period military governor)
守護大名: (しゅごだいみょう) - provincial military governor turned daimyo (Muromachi period) (distinct from the shugo bureaucrats of the Kamakura period)
守護竜: (しゅごりゅう) - (guards the 龍穴 from which flows the 龍脈) guardian dragon
守護龍: (しゅごりゅう) - (guards the 龍穴 from which flows the 龍脈) guardian dragon
安: (um/yasu) - cheap , cheap; rash, thoughtless, careless, indiscreet, frivolous
安々: (やすやす) - calmly; peacefully; painlessly; comfortably
安かろう悪かろう: (やすかろうわるかろう) - you get what you pay for; cheap and nasty
安くあがる: (やすくあがる) - to cost little; to come cheap
安くあげる: (やすくあげる) - to make it less expensive
安く上がる: (やすくあがる) - to cost little; to come cheap
安く上げる: (やすくあげる) - to make it less expensive
安く譲る: (やすくゆずる) - to sell (a thing) cheap
安ぴか: (やすぴか) - bauble; trinket; gimcrack; gewgaw; tchotchke; tsatske
安まる: (やすまる) - to be rested; to feel at ease; to repose; to be relieved
安らう: (やすらう) - to rest; to relax
安らか: (やすらか) - peaceful; tranquil; calm; restful
安らかな眠り: (やすらかなねむり) - peaceful sleep
安らぎ: (やすらぎ) - peace (of mind); tranquility; tranquillity; serenity
安らぐ: (やすらぐ) - to feel at ease
安んじる: (やすんじる) - to be contented; to be at ease
安パイ: (あんパイ) - {mahj}  'safe' tile (one that won't be taken up by other players if discarded); someone that can be safely ignored (e.g. in some competitive situation)
安住: (あんじゅう) - living in peace; being content with one's present position
安保: (あんぽ) - US-Japan Security Treaty; safety; security
安保条約: (あんぽじょうやく) - security treaty (esp. US-Japan Security Treaty)
安保理決議: (あんぽりけつぎ) - United Nations Security Council Resolution
安倍内閣: (あべないかく) - Abe Cabinet (inaugurated as the Japanese government, 2006-09-26)
安倍川餅: (あべかわもち) - rice cakes (mochi) with Kinako
安全を図る: (あんぜんをはかる) - to provide for safety
安全インターロック: (あんぜんインターロック) - safety interlock
安全パイ: (あんぜんパイ) - {mahj} tile that may be discarded without risking benefiting an opponent; no-risk choice/easily handled person
安全係数: (あんぜんけいすう) - safety factor
安全保護サービス: (あんぜんほごサービス) - security service
安全保護ラベル: (あんぜんほごラベル) - security label
安全保護付きアクセス管理: (あんぜんほごつきアクセスかんり) - secure access management; MT

安全保護能力: (あんぜんほごのうりょく) - security capabilities
